version_description: Additional Chromecast settings and bug fixes
Additional Chromecast settings and bug fixes
Additional Chromecast settings and bug fixes
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Personalize your TV home screen with art, personal photos, news and more by setting up backdrop.
Personalize your TV home screen with art, personal photos, news and more by setting up backdrop.
Personalize your TV home screen with art, personal photos, news and more by setting up backdrop.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

- Redesigned devices view, showing devices as cards with backdrop and casting status
- Added setting to change backdrop speed
- Browse through history of backdrop images recently shown on your Chromecasts
- Improved reliability and performance of backdrop cards
- Improved multi-user and multi-Chromecast backdrop settings
- New backdrop content: Street Art from Google Cultural Institute

- Redesigned devices view, showing devices as cards with backdrop and casting status
- Added setting to change backdrop speed
- Browse through history of backdrop images recently shown on your Chromecasts
- Improved reliability and performance of backdrop cards
- Improved multi-user and multi-Chromecast backdrop settings
- New backdrop content: Street Art from Google Cultural Institute

- Redesigned devices view, showing devices as cards with backdrop and casting status
- Added setting to change backdrop speed
- Browse through history of backdrop images recently shown on your Chromecasts
- Improved reliability and performance of backdrop cards
- Improved multi-user and multi-Chromecast backdrop settings
- New backdrop content: Street Art from Google Cultural Institute

Personalize backdrop with Facebook and Flickr photo albums and control (play, pause & change volume) all your Chromecast devices.
Support for all new Chromecast devices.

New content & app discovery features:
• What’s On: Browse popular and featured content from your favorite cast-enabled apps.   
• Get Apps: Discover new offers and cast-enabled apps from content partners, through our curated and merchandised experience. 
• Search: Find where you can cast your favorite movies and TV shows.
• iOS9 compatibility & bug fixes

New content & app discovery features:
• What’s On: Browse popular and featured content from your favorite cast-enabled apps.   
• Get Apps: Discover new offers and cast-enabled apps from content partners, through our curated and merchandised experience. 
• Search: Find where you can cast your favorite movies and TV shows.
• iOS9 compatibility & bug fixes

New content & app discovery features:
• What’s On: Browse popular and featured content from your favorite cast-enabled apps.   
• Get Apps: Discover new offers and cast-enabled apps from content partners, through our curated and merchandised experience. 
• Search: Find where you can cast your favorite movies and TV shows.
• iOS9 compatibility & bug fixes

We’re very excited to announce that the Google Cast app is now the Google Home app. We have new features and improvements to make the Google Home app even better!

• Setup, manage & control your Chromecast and Google Home devices*
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Some features may not be available in all countries.

Now with iPhone X support, the refreshed Google Home app makes it easier than ever for you to find and play some of your favorite movies, shows and music. We’ve also added new smarts with advanced search features to give you a better browsing experience.

With the new Google Home app, you can now control, organize and manage compatible lights, cameras, TVs and more, all from just one place.

• One simple view, with you in control.
• Shortcuts for the things you do most, like turning on and off the lights or playing music.
• Check up on your home when you're away, or use it as a remote for your Google Home, Chromecast and other devices

With the Google Home app, you can control and manage compatible lights, cameras, TVs, and more – all from one place.

Over the next few days the following feature will be available:

The Call Home quick action will let you start a Duo call with your Google Assistant-enabled smart displays. Tap “Call Home” and your Duo-linked smart displays will start ringing.

Over the next few days we’ll be rolling out the following features:
• The updated Home tab makes it easier to control and manage your devices.
• The new Feed tab highlights important events in your home.
• Use the Media quick action to play, control, or transfer music on compatible devices.
• Set up Nest Wifi in minutes and manage your network in the Google Home app.

Over the next few days we’ll be rolling out the following features:

Over the next few days we’ll be rolling out the following:

• You can now see a badge on the Home Feed icon when there are new Priority events to view and act on.
• Controlling your home is now easier – customize which type of device you’ve connected to your smart plug, outlet, or switch.

Over the next few days we’ll be rolling out the following:

• Import your Wi-Fi network from the Google Wifi app so you can manage your network and other connected devices in one place. Use Google Assistant to do things like pause Wi-Fi, check your internet speed, and show your guest Wi-Fi password on smart displays.
